description: GENESIS ART. Madruga started on the Graffiti scene in Rio de Janeiro in 2000. His work, heavily influenced by graphic design, consists of building an identity. An icon that aims to populate the urban space, generating a dialogue with the people who circulate through this medium. The continuity of this work led him to create a series of folds on top of the same icon and made him a classic character on the scene in Rio de Janeiro. Ig @mga021 twitter @madruga_mga antihorario.com.br
